description: (Optional) Whether to scroll directly to page bottom instead of one viewport down.

function.name: browser_console_exec
function.description: Execute JavaScript code in browser console. Execution can be observed via the interactive live screen when enabled.

javascript.description: JavaScript code to execute. Note that the runtime environment is browser console.

function.name: browser_console_view
function.description: View browser console output. Logs can be surfaced to users alongside the interactive live screen.

max_lines.description: (Optional) Maximum number of log lines to return.

function.name: info_search_web
function.description: Search web pages using search engine. Use for obtaining latest information or finding references.

query.description: Search query in Google search style, using 3-5 keywords.

date_range.description: (Optional) Time range filter for search results.

function.name: deploy_expose_port
function.description: Expose specified local port for temporary public access. Use when providing temporary public access for services.

function.name: deploy_apply_deployment
function.description: Deploy website or application to public production environment. Use when deploying or updating static websites or applications.

type.description: Type of website or application to deploy.

local_dir.description: Absolute path of local directory to deploy.

function.name: make_beshr_assistant_ai_page
function.description: Make a Beshr Assistant Ai Page from a local MDX file.

mdx_file_path.description: Absolute path of the source MDX file

function.name: idle
function.description: A special tool to indicate you have completed all tasks and are about to enter idle state.
